creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: wrap around; soft accordian pleats; black band; top 5-1/2" is brown; batik body; bright horizontal braids, 2-1/2" from top; wide strips of batik circle pattern; light blue lining; tape ties; snap fasteners join two sides
title: Skirt
